--- Astroblast / Dead-End / Drag Strip / Switchblade ---

Astroblast exits the Dark Avian, swipes a Energon cube, oblivius to 
any intruders. "Yes Megatron, I will arrive soon." He transforms into 
Space shuttle form when he clears the Dark Avian. His rear rockets 
fire, incinerating several shrubs and charring a tree behind him, as 
he moves forward. Slowly at first, Astroblast gains speed and 
momentum quickly, putting distance between himself and the trees 
below. He head towards the CF, and Megatron's location, reveling 
at the chance to help Maximals and their allies to their matrix.

---------------------------------------

Dead-End fly's past Skyscream, and lands on the ground, he 
groans. His eyes widden as he spots the impending doom. He 
quickly rolls to the side as two shells crash beside him. He rolls 
into a rock. Not a big rock, but a rock large enough to stop him 
from rolling. The third shell replaces Dead-End's arm, and some of 
his side armour, with a tangled mesh of mechafluid and wires. He 
groans, "Ughh, dangnabit...." He tries to get up without much 
success.

---------------------------------------

Drag Strip continues up to Incarcinator, continuing his plasma fire. 
"Wildrider, join the party," he yells without looking. 

---------------------------------------

Switchblade continues work on Speedbreaker. He smiles at his 
clever disguise; the sparks coming from the laser look like the 
sparks that would come from a damaged robot, and him being 
cloaked leaves it looking like a wreck on the ground. "Just wait 
Speedbreaker, you'll be up soon," he says quietly, mostly to 
himself.


On 8 May 2001, at 18:32, robertdahl wrote:

> OOC: Okay, every post sent by Scorpius, has a date on it before he
> quit. Sooooo, I am assuming he has quit, and his posts were just
> delayed. If I am wrong, Scorpius, tell me, and I will take back this
> post. (Just imagine they never appeared:))
> 
> BIC:
> Megatron opens up his comm-link. "Astroblast, get here amediately. You
> will be needed for phase two of my plan" he finishes, as his
> voicepiece contracts. He smiles a twisted expression, as his eyes
> begin to glow red. "Switchblade, get Speedbreaker fixed. He will be
> needed for my future plans". Megatron then looks at Triggerhappy,
> Scourge, and Cyclonus. "Transform my Decepticons, and ATTACK" he
> yells, poiting at the Element. "Nightstrike, follow their flank, and
> listen to Cyclonus. Motormaster, continue the plan. Skullgrin" he
> yells reffering to the Pretender. "Receive". 
> 
> Megatron then jumps straight up into the air, and starts a back flip.
> As he does, he starts to fold in on himself, and shrink, transforming
> into his gun mode. He then falls towards Skullgrin, waiting for him to
> catch him.
> 
> 
> Motormaster walks up towards Speedbreaker, to inspect the damage.
> 
> Wildrider continues to fall, and gracefully just misses the shells, as
> he was keeping his eyes on Incarcinerator. He looks towards Shockwave,
> and starts to laugh. "Commander Shockwave. Megatron wishes to speak to
> you".
>
